description:
In this talk, Ari plays with AngularJS. In this talk Ari covers from start-to-finish everything you need to know about building rich, interactive web-based games. He explores the digest loop, animations, real-time interaction, mobile, and much much more. Get ready to have some fun and press the start button!

Slides: http://goo.gl/HlgTXT 

Code: http://goo.gl/1Ya35m
title: Building games with AngularJS by Ari Lerner at ng-europe 2014
